---

# Tables

## Basic Table with Alignment

| Left Aligned | Center Aligned | Right Aligned |
|:-------------|:--------------:|--------------:|
| Row 1 Col 1  | Row 1 Col 2    |       $1,234  |
| Row 2 Col 1  | Row 2 Col 2    |       $5,678  |
| Row 3 Col 1  | Row 3 Col 2    |      $91,011  |

## Dense Numeric Data

| Year | Q1 Revenue | Q2 Revenue | Q3 Revenue | Q4 Revenue | Total      |
|------|------------|------------|------------|------------|------------|
| 2022 | 1,245,300  | 1,389,500  | 1,502,100  | 1,678,900  | 5,815,800  |
| 2023 | 1,567,200  | 1,723,400  | 1,890,600  | 2,034,100  | 7,215,300  |
| 2024 | 1,892,100  | 2,045,700  | 2,201,300  | 2,389,500  | 8,528,600  |
| 2025 | 2,134,500  | 2,298,700  | 2,467,100  | 2,612,400  | 9,512,700  |

## Single-Column Table

| Status   |
|----------|
| Active   |
| Pending  |
| Archived |
| Deleted  |

## Wide Table with Many Columns

| ID | Name | Email | Role | Team | Location | Start Date | Status | Level | Manager | Projects | Hours |
|----|------|-------|------|------|----------|------------|--------|-------|---------|----------|-------|
| 1  | Alice | alice@co.io | Engineer | Platform | NYC | 2022-03-15 | Active | Senior | Bob | 4 | 2080 |
| 2  | Bob | bob@co.io | Manager | Platform | SF | 2020-07-01 | Active | Staff | Carol | 6 | 1950 |
| 3  | Carol | carol@co.io | Director | Eng | Remote | 2019-01-20 | Active | Director | VP | 12 | 2200 |

## Table with Inline Formatting

| Feature | Description | Status |
|---------|-------------|--------|
| **Bold text** | Supports `inline code` and *italic* | :white_check_mark: |
| ~~Deprecated~~ | Use [new API](https://example.com) instead | Removed |
| ==Highlighted== | Combined **bold and *nested italic*** | Active |

## Table with Empty Cells

| Required | Optional | Default |
|----------|----------|---------|
| name     | alias    |         |
| email    |          |         |
|          | phone    | N/A     |
| address  |          | unknown |

## Minimal Two-Column Table

| Key | Value |
|-----|-------|
| a   | 1     |
| b   | 2     |
